co.cask.cdap.api.dataset.lib
Interface FileSet

All Superinterfaces:
Closeable, Dataset, InputFormatProvider, OutputFormatProvider
@Beta
public interface FileSet
extends Dataset, InputFormatProvider, OutputFormatProvider

This dataset represents a collection of files on the file system. The dataset has a base location, under which all of its files are located. When instantiated, runtime arguments are required to specify the individual file or files being used.

Method Summary
 org.apache.twill.filesystem.Location getBaseLocation()
          Allows to interact directly with the location of this dataset in the underlying file system.

          Allows direct access to files of this dataset in the underlying file system.

          Allows direct access to files in this dataset, in the underlying file system.

          Allows direct access to files in the output location, in the underlying file system.
